text: The Durrells (known in North America as The Durrells in Corfu) is a British comedy-drama television series loosely based on Gerald Durrell's three autobiographical books about his family's four years (1935â€“1939) on the Greek island of Corfu. It won the Broadcasting Press Guild Award for best actress in 2017 for Keeley Hawes. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:British television series Category:Corfu
title: The Durrells
